attributes.action: Bring back the football homenations tournament for next summer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is going to be a boring summer in britain with all the homenations failing to qualify for the European Cup, so why not bring back the homenations tournament to give our boys a chance to win back some pride and bring the passion back to british football.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
